class.name: DotnetPublishStep
class.description: A [dotnet publish step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET CLI command

function.name: dotnetPublish
function.description: Adds a [dotnet publish step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET CLI command @see DotnetPublishStep

param.name: paths
param.description: Specify paths to projects and solutions. Wildcards are supported.

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Working+Directory) for script, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: outputDir
param.description: The directory where to publish the app.

param.name: skipBuild
param.description: Do not build the project before testing

param.name: versionSuffix
param.description: Defines the value for the $(VersionSuffix) property in the project.

param.name: args
param.description: Enter additional command line parameters for dotnet publish.

param.name: required.sdk
param.description: .NET SDK versions separated by semicolon to be required on agents.
